name: Lich
damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
languages: Common plus up to five other languages

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day).
descriptions: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Rejuvenation.
descriptions: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The lich is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). The lich has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost
descriptions.hyperlinked: Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost

descriptions.raw: 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, magic missile, shield, thunderwave
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, magic missile, shield, thunderwave

descriptions.raw: 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, invisibility, Melf's acid arrow, mirror image
descriptions.hyperlinked: 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, invisibility, Melf's acid arrow, mirror image

descriptions.raw: 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, counterspell, dispel magic, fireball
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, counterspell, dispel magic, fireball

descriptions.raw: 6th level (1 slot): disintegrate, globe of invulnerability
7th level (1 slot): finger of death, plane shift
descriptions.hyperlinked: 7th level (1 slot): finger of death, plane shift

descriptions.raw: 8th level (1 slot): dominate monster, power word stun
descriptions.hyperlinked: 8th level (1 slot): dominate monster, power word stun

special_abilities.name: Turn Resistance.
descriptions: The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch.
descriptions: Melee Spell Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary_action_description: The lich can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. The lich regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costs 2 Actions).
descriptions: The lich uses its Paralyzing Touch.

legendary_actions.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions).
descriptions: The lich fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions).
descriptions: Each non-undead creature within 20 feet of the lich must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 (6d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
